channel.title: Creating packets/creating action button ids client sided
channel.description: [code] stream.createFrame(185); stream.writeWord(5843); [/code] I'm using the following code to to get the rest button to work server sided, but the only problem is, it only works every 2 clicks. I have no idea what generates the id, nor do I really know what i'm doing. It's 4 am and IM TIRED. Can someone please explain this to me :|

I’m using the following code to to get the rest button to work server sided, but the only problem is, it only works every 2 clicks.
